entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:08 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 9:00 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of wet snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 8:10 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snow inland in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. High plus 5. Forecast issued 8:10 PM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
